sqlMap.select: select key_value from cKeyWordMap where key_word=#REGION_CODE# AND op_code = #OP_CODE# AND op_type = 'MODE'
sqlMap.insert: insert into cKeyWordMap (op_code, op_type, key_word, key_value, note, is_valid) values (#OP_CODE#, 'MODE', #REGION_CODE#, #OP_TYPE#, #NOTE#, 1)
sqlMap.delete: delete from cKeyWordMap WHERE op_code = #OP_CODE# AND op_type = 'MODE' AND key_word = #REGION_CODE#
